sense.def:
To gauge something
pomeni nekaj zmeriti ali presoditi.

seg.quote: With a modern machine, you can gauge the number of stitches.
I couldn't gauge how it would affect me.

sense.def:
A gauge
je naprava, ki kaže količino nečesa.
sense.QP:
glej slikovno prilogo
CAR AND BICYCLE
.

seg.quote: The fuel gauge dropped swiftly towards zero.

sense.def:
A gauge
je tudi dejstvo, ki ga lahko uporabimo za presojanje nekega položaja.

seg.quote: The increase in attendance was used as a gauge of the course's success.
